title: What do I do?
body:
What do I do? Like, the amount of BS. like, wat. (Images will explain it all. 

https://imgur.com/a/buuPD#AbngNpy

replies.body:
You made a good first step by trying to update you graphics drivers, but this looks like more of an issue specific to DirectX. You may need to check for any additional updates for [**DirectX**](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/179113) that you may have missed. 

If that doesn't help, go over the rest of the steps in our [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to rule out any other possibilities.
